wikipedia_page.main: Paul Dennis O'Neill (born 17 June 1982) is an English footballer who played in The Football League for Macclesfield Town. He made his professional debut towards the end of the 1999–2000 season. He struggled in League football and entered Welsh football in 2004. Signed for non league club Chorley in 2013

response: *Paul O'Neill (baseball) (born 1963), former Major League Baseball player and current broadcaster

*Paul O'Neill (newspaper editor), editor of The Irish Times
*Paul O'Neill (producer) (1956–2017), American rock music producer, composer and guitarist
